item.title: Research
item.description: 2022 FlexOS: towards flexible OS isolation Hugo Lefeuvre, Vlad-Andrei Bădoiu, Alexander Jung, Stefan Lucian Teodorescu, Sebastian Rauch, Felipe Huici, Costin Raiciu, Pierre Olivier - in ASPLOS 22 [Distinguished Artifact Award] MSpec: Automated Safety Reasoning for OS Compartmentalization, Vlad-Andrei Bădoiu - in EuroDW 22 2021 FlexOS: Making OS Isolation Flexible H. Lefeuvre, Vlad-Andrei Bădoiu, S. Teodorescu, T. Mosnoi, C. Raiciu, P. Olivier, R. Deaconescu, F. Huici - in HotOS 2021.
